statements: DELETE FROM endangered_species WHERE pollution_level > 5 AND species_category = 'Mammals';
DELETE FROM conservation_groups WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest' AND conservation_status = 'Endangered';
DELETE FROM SpeciesConservation WHERE group_id = 5 AND conservation_status = 'Critically Endangered';
DELETE FROM ConservationGroups WHERE group_name = 'GreenEarth Conservation'
DELETE FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Critically Endangered';
DELETE FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE species_id = 1 AND conservation_status = 'Endangered';
DELETE FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE pollution_threat = 'High' AND species_name = 'Tiger';
